        Initializes the camera and sets it up for accessing frames.
        Parameters:
        targetSize - a predefined constant TARGET_SIZE. If set to null, the helper will default to 1280 * 720.

      • takePicture

        public void takePicture​(java.io.File outputFile,
                        androidx.camera.core.ImageCapture.OnImageSavedCallback onImageSavedCallback)
        Captures a new still image and saves to a file along with application specified metadata. This method works when {@link NewCameraXPreviewHelper#startCamera)} has been called previously enabling image capture. The callback will be called only once for every invocation of this method.
        Parameters:
        outputFile - Save location for captured image.
        onImageSavedCallback - Callback to be called for the newly captured image.
